00001 import wx
00002 from iga.individual import Individual
00003 from pickle import dumps
00004 import math
00005 
00006 #-------------------------------------------#
00007 class Application:
00008     def __init__(self, params, random):
00009         self.random = random
00010         self.params = params
00011 
00012         # if user provided list of variables to encode
00013        # then determine the number of bits
00014        # necessary to encode the variables
00015         if self.params.has_key('vars'):
00016             vars = self.params['vars']
00017             bits = 0
00018             attr = {}
00019             for name,value in vars.iteritems():
00020                 if value.has_key('scale'):
00021                     scale = value['scale']
00022                 else:
00023                     scale = 1
00024                 varBits = math.ceil(math.log((value['max']-value['min'])/float(scale), 2))
00025                 bits += varBits
00026                 attr[name] = {'max': value['max'], 'min': value['min'], 'bits': varBits}
00027             self.attr = attr
00028             self.geneLen = bits
00029         else:
00030             self.geneLen = self.params['bits']
00031             self.attr = None
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035         import time
00036         ltime = time.localtime()
00037         hour, min = ltime[3], ltime[4]
00038         self.fb = open('data/%s_blood_%d-%d' % (params['name'], 
00039                     hour, min), 'w')
00040         self.fb.write('gen  full  3quarter half quarter mud\n')
00041 
00042         self.fpop = open('data/%s_pop_%d-%d' % (params['name'], 
00043                     hour, min), 'w')
00044         self.fpop.write('gen  pop\n')
00045 
00046         #self.ffit = open('data/%s_fit_%d-%d' % (params['name'], hour, min), 'w')
00047         #self.ffit.write('gen  sum_fitness\n')
00048 
00049 #-------------------------------------------#
00050     def createPop(self, popsize):        
00051         pop = [Individual(self.random, self.geneLen) for i in xrange(popsize)]
00052         return pop
00053 
00054 #-------------------------------------------#
00055     def decode(self, chrom):
00056         '''
00057         Decode bit string.
00058         '''
00059         bits = 0
00060         data = {}
00061         for name,value in self.attr.iteritems():
00062             temp = 0
00063             top = int(bits+value['bits'])
00064             for i in xrange(int(bits), top):
00065                 if chrom[i]:
00066                     temp += 2**(top-i-1)
00067 
00068             temp = temp / (2.**value['bits'] - 1)
00069             temp =  temp * (value['max']-value['min']) + value['min']
00070             data[name] = temp
00071             bits += value['bits']
00072 
00073         return data
00074         
00075 #-------------------------------------------#
00076     def fitness(self, ind, user_feedback):
00077         '''
00078         Compute fitness.
00079         '''
00080         ind.fitness = sum(ind.genome)
00081 
00082 #-------------------------------------------#
00083     def scaleFitness(self, pop):
00084         for ind in pop:
00085             ind.scalefit = ind.fitness
00086 
00087 #-------------------------------------------#
00088     def draw(self, parentPanel, subset):
00089         '''
00090         Return a list of panels to be displayed to the user for evaluation.
00091         Use the arg parentPanel as the parent for each of the panels created.
00092         '''
00093         panel = []
00094         for i in xrange(len(subset)):
00095             panel.append(wx.Panel(parentPanel))
00096         return panel
00097 
00098 #-------------------------------------------#
00099     def report(self, pop, gen):
00100         '''
00101         Write to console or file
00102         population statistics.
00103         '''
00104         fb = self.fb
00105         blood = {'full': 0, 'half': 0, 
00106                 'quarter': 0, 'mud': 0, 
00107                 '3quarter':0, }
00108 
00109         for ind in pop:
00110             if ind.bloodline == 0.:
00111                 blood['mud'] += 1
00112 
00113             elif ind.bloodline == 1.:
00114                 blood['full'] += 1
00115 
00116             elif ind.bloodline == 0.5:
00117                 blood['half'] += 1
00118 
00119             elif ind.bloodline < 0.5:
00120                 blood['quarter'] += 1
00121 
00122             else:
00123                 blood['3quarter'] += 1
00124 
00125                         
00126         blood_str = '%d  %d  %d  %d  %d  %d\n' % (gen, blood['full'],
00127                         blood['3quarter'], blood['half'], 
00128                         blood['quarter'], blood['mud'])
00129         fb.write(blood_str)
00130 
00131         # dump pop pickle
00132         self.fpop.write('%d %s\n' % (gen, dumps(pop)))
00133
